comments:
Problem:
--------

Every time I try to run the "Plants By WebSphere" sample of WAS on the HTTP
recorder, it halts prematurely and never successfully runs the test case.

When the sample loads up, I simply click on the "Flowers" link -> wait for it to
load -> then click on the "African Orchid" link.  Then I close the browser and
follow the instructions in the help file to run the test.  The test does not
complete successfully and it results in a bunch of errors, which all have a
similar exception.

All of the exceptions are of the following form:

java.lang.Exception:

Created an attachment (id=15273)
Test suite that exhibits the problem when performing Test Execution

This testsuite shows the problem when executing.

When I attempted to recreate this problem, I found a different error.  Each 
time during test execution, when attempting to GET the 15th page, the 
following error occurs:

Adding Hendra Suwanda to the CC list because Navid has gone back to school. If
you have any questions about these defects then please ask Hendra.

This is a Test Execution defect, not a recording defect.  The Summary is 
misleading.  I have reassigned to Todd so he can assign it to the appropriate 
person.

Assigned to Mark Dunn, at least temporarily.  Left priority at P3 until it is 
determined something that URL test is expected to do automatically, i.e. 
without code modification by the user to handle transaction content.
I just ran this exact test successfully on hyades 3.3.0.2 . The problems that existed have been fixed.  I do have a different problem running this on tptp 4.2 (but not this problem)
